name: Sliding Swords
description:
A roguelite, dungeon crawler, where you move all objects at the same time, and the same types that touch - merge into one! Defeat enemies, level up, solve quests, unlock new things, upgrade your character, and cast powerful spells!

Puzzle Dungeon Crawler

Discover a fresh mix of a puzzle game, a dungeon crawler, and a deck builder!

Roguelite

Each play is procedurally generated. You can make your next runs better with upgrades bought in the shop, unlocking new powerups with finishing quests, and progressing the plot.

Synergies

I've designed the skills, upgrades, and crafting system to help you find out new builds and use them to beat the game.

Plot

This game is a part of the TAnima Universe. A growing ecosystem of games about the Living Crystal.
